Name: NeoBalls
About the game: We are glad to see you again in the world of Neo Now you need to shoot the cubes until they disappear. Do not forget that here is not 1 row. Use the bonus to look through the eyes of the ball and choose the correct trajectory. Direct the neoshar with a beam and throw it straight at the target. Kill the cubes one by one and score points. To destroy a cube you need hit into it as many times as it written on the cube. Each glowing ball that you collect will add to your collection 1 extra ball. Make it so that the maximum number of balls hit into cubes. Do not forget, if the cube reach the bottom then you lose. Put your record!
